column4: hi everyone. I know this will probably bother some people but I'm totally stuck getting my wireless card to be recognized. would someone care to help me out. I'll be ever grateful
I can't get my Centrino(R) Wireless-N 2200 to be picked up no matter what commands I run
lsmod | grep wl does not return anything
I'm talking to XiaolinDraconis, sorry, not addressing your problem
